nodes.text: The Sixteenth Army, also known as Ivory Fang Command, was a Republic and later Imperial Sector Army charged with the defense of the Pallis Oversector.

During the Clone Wars, it held an important yet largely defensive role in command. Its duties include being prepared to move Coreward, as well as to reinforce Corellia or Rimward up the Corellian Run, as well as protecting the Coreward Hydian Way and the Shipwrights' Trace from the Separatists.
